game_description: A fun platformer where you "run in place" to move forward and "jump in place" to jump. Gather coins and beat levels while running where you stand. Use your body to run, jump and navigate obstacles in a cartoony adventure. It is both fun and a great exercise.
Developer: Seen in a Dream Entertainment AB
Publisher: Seen in a Dream Entertainment AB
